name: OzTraffic
description:
Made for the National Road Safety Game Jam! - itch.io
supporting Australian road safety.

To play: Enter Stage 1 from the main menu and get driving.

- W  to go forward,
- steer using mouse movement
- use various keys to manage issues as you go

**********************************************************
PLEASE NOTE: There is currently a bug that prevents you getting into Stage 2!!

***********************************************************

Should you go for 10 minutes without a collision, you can then try Stage 2.
